title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2430/90 of 21 August 1990 fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the amount of the aid for the calculation of certain varieties of grape intended for drying
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2430/90
of 21 August 1990
fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the amount of the aid for the calculation of certain varieties of grape intended for drying
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1990/91 marketing year the per hectare aid for the cultivation of sultanas, currants and muscatels intended for processing pursuant to Article 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 426/86 is hereby fixed at ECU 511 per hectare of specialized area harvested. This amount, however, is fixed without prejudice to the differentiation to be carried out, before 1 November 1990, in application of Article 6 (1), third paragraph, of the abovementioned Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 August 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
